org.ajgl.primary

Class GameObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ajgl.primary.Drawable
      • org.ajgl.primary.GameObject
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Collidable, ConvexPolygon, Polygon
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    QuadTreeNode

    public class GameObject
extends Drawable
implements Collidable
    This class is designed to be a multi-purpose class that most game object should extend.
    Author:
    Tyler Bucher

        Creates a GameObject object that has color and texture.
        Parameters:
        vertices - - Vertices of the convex shape
        colorData - - RGB or RGBA color data
        textureData - - Localized texture vertices
        GL_SHAPE_TYPE - - The shape type of which will be rendered by OpenGL
        texture - - The texture of the Drawable object
